snippet: The latest New York Times/CBS News poll reveals a racial divide in how Americans view the reactions of the president and the Missouri governor to the turbulence in Ferguson, Mo.
lead_paragraph: The latest New York Times/CBS News poll reveals a racial divide in how Americans view the reactions of the president and the Missouri governor to the turbulence in Ferguson, Mo.

headline.main: Poll Finds Racial Divide in Viewing Response to Ferguson Unrest
headline.print_headline: Poll Finds Racial Divide in Viewing Response to Ferguson Unrest
